About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi, my name is Tyler Cooke. I am 24 and am a web design student based in Atlanta, Georgia. I started developing a passion for technology from a young age and most of my design skills and knowledge are self-taught. I have moved into digital media after joining the Immersive Program at DigitalCrafts where I am learning a range of skills and software including:

  • HTML5
  • CSS3
  • Javascript
  • Bootstrap
  • JSON
  • React.js
  • Linux
  • Apache
  • PostgreSQL
  • Python
  • A.W.S.
  • Express
  • Node.js
